creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: embroidered collar in the shape of a V; pattern repeated throughout with various colors that are darker and more muted--orange-yellow, maroon, blue, cream, spring green; fringe is all along bottom edge in same various colors; pattern is geometric shapes; back has cotton fabric with one half red plaid print and other half blue plaid print
dimension: 7 1/2 x 29 in. (19.05 x 73.66 cm) (tip to tip across)
title: Collar
